ai_sprite.name: lamoni
ai_sprite.dialog: Welcome! I am Lamoni, king over the land Ishmael, and son of Mathoni, king over all the Lamanites. The Nephites have been friendly to us, and I support your cause of recruiting those of my people that wish to join you. However, before you pass through my land, I must ask that you handle the trouble makers north of here at the Waters of Sebus. They keep scattering my flocks.
